items.sentence: Tom told me that he wasn't planning on staying very long.
Tom told me that he was interested in visiting Australia.
Tom told me that he was going to try to find another job.
Tom told me that he didn't have to be at today's meeting.
Tom told me that he didn't have enough money to buy that.
I don't think Tom is as crazy as some people think he is.
I don't think that Tom and Mary have finished doing that.
I don't think Tom knows what time the meeting will start.
I don't think Tom knows what kind of shoes he should buy.
Do you think that Tom would do that if he had the chance?
